leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-实验合成与表征自动化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集→计划→执行→记录→复现/审计
leaf_cluster.tool_form: LIMS/设备接口 + 闭环平台

queries: [WEB] bayesian optimization for materials science github
[WEB] design of experiments python library github

tools.name: ARES OS
tools.one_line_profile: Research software for closed-loop autonomous experimentation systems
tools.detailed_description: ARES OS is a software platform designed to streamline the creation and management of autonomous research systems (self-driving labs). It enables closed-loop experimentation by integrating hardware control with automated planning and decision-making algorithms.

tools.name: AI4SIM Model Collection
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of deep learning surrogate models for physical processes
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing various deep learning models and PyTorch Lightning pipelines developed for surrogating physical processes, facilitating the application of AI in scientific simulation tasks.

tools.name: LE-PDE-UQ
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning surrogate models with uncertainty quantification for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A framework that endows deep learning-based surrogate models with robust and efficient uncertainty quantification (UQ) capabilities, applicable to both forward and inverse problems in partial differential equations (PDEs).

tools.name: mof_screen
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput DFT screening workflow for MOFs
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based workflow tool for performing high-throughput Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations and screening of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs) using ASE and VASP interfaces.

tools.name: DiT-Based-Microstructures-Design
tools.one_line_profile: Latent Diffusion-based inverse design for damping microstructures
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool utilizing Latent Diffusion Models (DiT) for the inverse design of material microstructures with specific multiaxial nonlinear mechanical targets.

tools.name: Axelrod
tools.one_line_profile: Research tool for the Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma simulation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive research library for conducting simulations and tournaments of the Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma, widely used in evolutionary biology, game theory, and social science research.

tools.name: FactFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Transformer for PDE surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a scalable Transformer architecture designed specifically for surrogate modeling of Partial Differential Equations (PDEs), enabling fast inference for physics simulations.

tools.name: vsLab
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual high-throughput screening workflow using AutoDock and VMD
tools.detailed_description: A software implementation for conducting virtual high-throughput screening (vHTS) campaigns, integrating AutoDock for docking and VMD for visualization and management.

tools.name: rDock
tools.one_line_profile: Fast open-source molecular docking program
tools.detailed_description: A fast and versatile molecular docking software designed for High Throughput Virtual Screening (HTVS) and binding mode prediction of small molecules against proteins and nucleic acids.

tools.name: ECPL-ICM&M Control Platform
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB-based real-time measurement and feedback control platform for photopolymer additive manufacturing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software platform for real-time interferometric measurement and feedback control of custom mask-projection photopolymerization additive manufacturing systems. It interfaces with hardware (UV lamp, DMD, camera) to perform online acquisition, analysis, and control.

tools.name: DFlat
tools.one_line_profile: Forward and inverse design framework for flat optics and metasurfaces
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for the forward and inverse design of flat optics, specifically metasurfaces. It supports end-to-end imaging and sensing tasks, enabling optimization of optical components.

tools.name: DFlat-tensorflow
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of the DFlat framework for flat optics design
tools.detailed_description: The TensorFlow version of the DFlat framework, facilitating forward and inverse design of metasurface optics and other end-to-end imaging/sensing tasks using deep learning backends.

tools.name: FielDHub
tools.one_line_profile: R Shiny application for Design of Experiments (DOE) in agriculture and biology
tools.detailed_description: An R Shiny app that aids in the creation of traditional, unreplicated, augmented, and partially replicated designs for agriculture, plant breeding, forestry, and biological sciences.

tools.name: gpudrive
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance multi-agent driving simulator for autonomous driving research
tools.detailed_description: A 1 million FPS multi-agent driving simulator designed for reinforcement learning and autonomous driving research, enabling large-scale simulation and training.

tools.name: Emukit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for decision making, uncertainty quantification, and Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: A highly adaptable Python toolkit for enriching decision making with uncertainty quantification. It supports multi-fidelity modeling, experimental design, Bayesian optimization, and Bayesian quadrature.

tools.name: BrazilMet
tools.one_line_profile: R package for acquiring and processing Brazilian meteorological data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate the acquisition and processing of meteorological data from INMET stations. It includes functions for downloading data, calculating atmospheric parameters, and estimating evapotranspiration.

tools.name: Basic-Database-On-LBT
tools.one_line_profile: Reusable parameter database for Ladybug Tools environmental simulation
tools.detailed_description: A repository storing reusable parameter information for Ladybug, Honeybee, and Dragonfly, which are tools for environmental design and building physics simulation.

tools.name: AeroVECTOR
tools.one_line_profile: Model rocket simulator for active control system design and tuning
tools.detailed_description: A simulator oriented to the design and tuning of active control systems (TVC, Active Fin Control) for model rockets. It computes subsonic aerodynamic parameters and integrates 3DOF equations of motion.

tools.name: Marco Polo
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for high-throughput crystallization screening analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python GUI application built for high-throughput crystallization screening users to facilitate data analysis and visualization. Developed at Hauptman-Woodward Medical Research Institute.

tools.name: ChemFlow_py
tools.one_line_profile: Computational toolbox for virtual High Throughput Screening (vHTS)
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based computational toolbox designed to facilitate virtual High Throughput Screening workflows in chemistry and materials science.

tools.name: MetasurfaceVIT
tools.one_line_profile: Generic framework for optical inverse design using Vision Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A generic framework for optical inverse design that leverages Vision Transformers (ViT) to predict metasurface structures, facilitating the design of optical components.

tools.name: ob-1
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB library for nanophotonic inverse design
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library designed for nanophotonic inverse design, enabling the optimization of nanophotonic structures for specific optical properties.

tools.name: LIO_SAM_6AXIS
tools.one_line_profile: LIO-SAM implementation for 6-axis IMU and GNSS
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of LIO-SAM (Lidar Inertial Odometry via Smoothing and Mapping) tailored for 6-axis IMU and GNSS integration, used for robust SLAM and mapping.

tools.name: Curie
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for automated and rigorous scientific experimentation with AI agents
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent framework designed to automate scientific experimentation, enabling rigorous and autonomous discovery processes in research environments.

tools.name: Kriging-and-GE-Kriging-model-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for Gradient-enhanced Kriging surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox implementing Kriging and Gradient-Enhanced Kriging (GEK) surrogate models, useful for approximating expensive simulation functions in engineering and scientific optimization.

tools.name: MultiscaleTopOpt
tools.one_line_profile: 3D multiscale topology optimization code using surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A code for 3D multiscale topology optimization that utilizes surrogate models to predict the response of lattice microstructures, developed by LLNL.

tools.name: readfish
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tool for flexible and fast adaptive sampling on ONT sequencers
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool designed for Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencers to perform flexible and fast adaptive sampling, enabling selective sequencing of DNA molecules.

tools.name: pysur
tools.one_line_profile: Engineering surrogate modeling and optimization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for engineering surrogate modeling and optimization, providing tools to create and utilize surrogate models for design and analysis.

tools.name: GaBOtorch
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization on Riemannian manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization (GaBO), allowing for optimization on Riemannian manifolds, useful for constrained scientific problems.

tools.name: ChimeraTE
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to detect chimeric transcripts derived from genes and transposable elements
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect chimeric transcripts that originate from the fusion of genes and transposable elements.

tools.name: PaddleCFD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for fluid mechanics surrogate modeling and optimization
tools.detailed_description: PaddleCFD is a deep learning-based toolkit designed for fluid mechanics applications. It provides capabilities for surrogate modeling, equation discovery, shape optimization, and flow-control strategy discovery, leveraging the PaddlePaddle framework to accelerate CFD simulations and analysis.

tools.name: Bayesian-Optimization-for-Unity
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization integration for Unity-based simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Unity asset that bridges the BoTorch Bayesian optimization library with Unity simulations. It enables human-in-the-loop optimization workflows where the optimizer proposes parameters, collects feedback (from simulation or user), and iteratively updates the model, suitable for experimental design in virtual environments.

tools.name: MATSuMoTo
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB Surrogate Model Toolbox for global optimization
tools.detailed_description: MATSuMoTo (MATLAB Surrogate Model Toolbox) is a library for computationally expensive global optimization problems. It employs surrogate models to approximate objective functions, reducing the computational cost of simulations in engineering and scientific design.

tools.name: Multiple Physics Pretraining
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-training framework for physical surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A codebase implementing multiple physics pretraining strategies for developing robust physical surrogate models. It focuses on leveraging diverse physical datasets to train foundation models that can generalize across different physical systems and partial differential equations.

tools.name: FireCore
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated simulation environment for on-surface chemistry and SPM
tools.detailed_description: FireCore is a high-performance simulation environment designed for on-surface chemistry and scanning-probe microscopy (SPM). It integrates GPU-accelerated classical molecular dynamics and Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations to streamline high-throughput screening of molecular configurations on crystalline solids.

tools.name: UCSF ChimeraX
tools.one_line_profile: Next-generation molecular visualization and analysis program
tools.detailed_description: Source code for UCSF ChimeraX, a highly extensible program for interactive visualization and analysis of molecular structures and related data, including density maps, supramolecular assemblies, sequence alignments, and docking results.

tools.name: Multiclass_Metasurface_InverseDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative model for metasurface inverse design
tools.detailed_description: A conditional Deep Convolutional Generative Adversarial Network (cDCGAN) framework for the inverse design of metasurfaces. It allows for the generation of metasurface geometric patterns based on desired optical properties across multiple classes of designs.

tools.name: Radon-Transform_Schultz-Gu
tools.one_line_profile: Discrete inverse and forward Radon transform routines
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based toolkit providing flexible routines for discrete inverse and forward Radon transforms. It supports multiple regularization methods and path functions, designed for geophysical applications such as seismic data processing and imaging.

tools.name: SMT
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate Modeling Toolbox for scientific and engineering applications
tools.detailed_description: SMT (Surrogate Modeling Toolbox) is a Python package that contains a collection of surrogate modeling methods (e.g., Kriging, RBF, KPLS) and sampling techniques. It is designed to approximate computationally expensive functions in scientific simulation and engineering design optimization.

tools.name: Chaotic-GSA
tools.one_line_profile: Chaotic Gravitational Search Algorithm for engineering design optimization
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Chaotic Gravitational Search Algorithm (CGSA), a physics-inspired heuristic optimization method. It integrates chaotic maps to improve global search capability and convergence speed, applicable to various engineering design and scientific optimization problems.

tools.name: AgentLaboratory
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end autonomous research agent framework
tools.detailed_description: Agent Laboratory is an autonomous research workflow system powered by LLMs. It assists researchers by automating parts of the scientific process, including literature review, idea generation, experiment planning, and code implementation, acting as a digital research assistant.

tools.name: Surrogates.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate modeling and optimization library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library provided by the SciML ecosystem for building surrogate models of complex systems. It supports various sampling strategies and surrogate types (Kriging, Neural Networks, etc.) to accelerate simulation and optimization tasks in scientific machine learning.

tools.name: MAPS
tools.one_line_profile: AI-assisted Photonic Device Inverse Design Framework
tools.detailed_description: MAPS is a framework for the inverse design of photonic devices using artificial intelligence. It facilitates the automated discovery of device geometries that meet specific optical performance criteria, streamlining the design process in nanophotonics.

tools.name: GPyOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Process Optimization library
tools.detailed_description: GPyOpt is a Python library for Bayesian optimization based on Gaussian Processes. It is designed to optimize black-box functions, making it highly suitable for hyperparameter tuning, experimental design, and optimizing expensive scientific simulations.

tools.name: GA-for-inverse-design
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic Algorithm implementation for inverse design of metasurfaces
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Genetic Algorithms specifically tailored for the inverse design of metasurfaces with non-local interactions, facilitating the discovery of optical structures with desired properties.

tools.name: BEM_Surrogate_Propeller
tools.one_line_profile: Propeller calculation and optimization using Surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for propeller performance calculation and optimization utilizing Blade Element Momentum (BEM) theory coupled with surrogate modeling techniques for efficient engineering design.

tools.name: AdaCAD-UI
tools.one_line_profile: Parametric design workspace for weave drafting and textile engineering
tools.detailed_description: An experimental workspace that applies parametric design principles to the domain of weave drafting, supporting algorithmic development of woven structures for shaft and jacquard looms.

tools.name: nextorch
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental design and Bayesian optimization library for chemical sciences
tools.detailed_description: A Python/PyTorch library designed for experimental design and Bayesian optimization, specifically tailored to accelerate scientific discovery in chemistry and materials science by automating parameter search.

tools.name: Contour-SGLD
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive importance sampling for multi-modal distribution simulations
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Contour Stochastic Gradient Langevin Dynamics, an adaptive importance sampling algorithm designed for efficient simulation and sampling of multi-modal distributions in physics and statistics.

tools.name: ChatMOF
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based system for prediction and inverse design of Metal-Organic Frameworks
tools.detailed_description: An AI system leveraging Large Language Models to predict properties and perform inverse design of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs), bridging natural language processing with materials science tasks.

tools.name: IM2ODE
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse Design of Materials using Multi-objective Differential Evolution
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool for the inverse design of materials, utilizing multi-objective differential evolution algorithms to optimize material properties and structures.

tools.name: GNN-UDS
tools.one_line_profile: Hydraulic surrogate model for urban drainage networks
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network based surrogate model for simulating hydraulic dynamics and enabling real-time control of urban drainage networks.

tools.name: gpsearch
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization and active learning library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Bayesian optimization and active learning that implements likelihood-weighted acquisition functions, suitable for optimizing expensive scientific experiments or simulations.

tools.name: pyview
tools.one_line_profile: Qubit data acquisition and visualization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A collection of reusable classes and functions for qubit data acquisition setups, facilitating the control and measurement of quantum experiments.

tools.name: ProtTrans
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art pretrained language models for proteins
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing access to high-performance protein language models (ProtBert, ProtT5, etc.) trained on massive protein sequence databases, enabling downstream tasks in bioinformatics and protein engineering.

tools.name: Meta_SCMT
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design tool for large-area dielectric metasurfaces
tools.detailed_description: Software for the inverse design of large-area dielectric metasurfaces that achieves full-wave level accuracy with reduced computational resources compared to traditional methods.

tools.name: QUBO-Chimera
tools.one_line_profile: Software simulation of D-Wave's native QUBO problem solving
tools.detailed_description: A tool to test and simulate how effectively D-Wave's native Quadratic Unconstrained Binary Optimization (QUBO) problems on the Chimera graph architecture can be solved in software.

tools.name: CSS
tools.one_line_profile: Drug combination sensitivity and synergy scoring tool
tools.detailed_description: R code for calculating the Drug Combination Sensitivity Score (CSS) and synergy scores, facilitating the evaluation of drug combination efficacy in high-throughput screening data.

tools.name: vsi2tif
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for cellSens VSI microscopy images to pyramidal TIFF
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool for converting Whole Slide Images (WSI) from the proprietary cellSens VSI format to standard pyramidal TIFF format, enabling broader compatibility with bioimaging software.

tools.name: High-throughput-molecular-docking
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for high-throughput molecular docking using AutoDock Vina
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based pipeline for automating high-throughput molecular docking and virtual screening processes using AutoDock Vina, designed to handle large libraries of compounds.

tools.name: active-learning-md
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for generating machine learning inter-atomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: An active learning workflow designed to generate machine learning inter-atomic potentials (MLIPs) for molecular dynamics simulations, demonstrated on amorphous and liquid Hafnium dioxide.

tools.name: compas_cem
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design tool for 3D truss networks using combinatorial equilibrium modeling
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the COMPAS framework that enables the inverse design of 3D truss networks (structures in static equilibrium) using automatic differentiation and combinatorial equilibrium modeling.

tools.name: PyTheus
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse-design algorithm for quantum optical experiments
tools.detailed_description: A highly-efficient inverse-design algorithm and tool for discovering quantum optical experimental setups that produce desired quantum states or properties.

tools.name: JANUS
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel tempered genetic algorithm for inverse molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for inverse molecular design that combines parallel tempering with genetic algorithms and deep neural networks to explore chemical space efficiently.

tools.name: Tartarus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking platform for inverse molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking platform designed to evaluate realistic and practical inverse molecular design algorithms, focusing on synthesizability and property optimization.

tools.name: Theseus
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse-design tool for quantum optical experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the efficient inverse-design of quantum optical experiments, aiming to provide conceptual understanding of the generated setups.

tools.name: Golem
tools.one_line_profile: Robust experiment and process optimization algorithm
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm and tool for robust experiment and process optimization, designed to handle uncertainties and noise in experimental conditions.

tools.name: Olympus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for noisy optimization and experiment planning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework for evaluating optimization algorithms in the context of experimental planning, specifically handling noisy data and various surface types.

tools.name: Chimera
tools.one_line_profile: Observatory automation system
tools.detailed_description: A distributed control system for astronomical observatories, enabling automation of telescopes, cameras, and other instruments for scientific data acquisition.

tools.name: Coupling_ABAQUS_MATLAB
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for coupling ABAQUS and MATLAB for Software-in-the-Loop simulations
tools.detailed_description: A framework enabling the interconnection of ABAQUS (FEA) and MATLAB for closed-loop simulations, optimization, and control analysis in structural and mechanical engineering.

tools.name: EDBO
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental Design via Bayesian Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for optimizing chemical and biological experiments using Bayesian Optimization, specifically designed for reaction optimization and substrate scope analysis.

tools.name: surmise
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate modeling and calibration interface
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating surrogate models that interface with calibration tools, designed to assist in uncertainty quantification and model emulation for scientific simulations.

tools.name: BASF DoE
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible generation of D-optimal experimental designs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package developed by BASF for generating D-optimal experimental designs, facilitating efficient planning of scientific experiments.

tools.name: BayesianOptimization
tools.one_line_profile: Global optimization with Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A pure Python implementation of Bayesian Optimization with Gaussian Processes, widely used as a solver for experimental planning and hyperparameter tuning in scientific workflows.

tools.name: CellPyAbility
tools.one_line_profile: Automated analysis of in cellulo high-throughput drug screening
tools.detailed_description: Software for the automated analysis of high-throughput drug screening data in cellulo, facilitating the processing of large-scale biological experimental results.

tools.name: oiffile
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for Olympus Image Format (OIF/OIB) microscopy files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to read Olympus image files (OIF and OIB), commonly used in microscopy for scientific imaging data.

tools.name: gRNAde
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI framework for inverse design of 3D RNA structures
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning framework for the inverse design of 3D RNA structures, enabling the generation of RNA sequences that fold into desired backbone geometries.

tools.name: BerkeleyPhotonicInverseDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous Adjoint Optimization for Photonic Inverse Design
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for continuous adjoint optimization in photonic inverse design, interfacing with Lumerical FDTD for physics simulations.

tools.name: cnn-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian deep convolutional surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A framework using Bayesian deep convolutional encoder-decoder networks for surrogate modeling and uncertainty quantification in scientific computing contexts.

tools.name: pde-surrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-constrained deep learning for PDE surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for high-dimensional surrogate modeling of partial differential equations (PDEs) using physics constraints, enabling label-free training.

tools.name: GPdoemd
tools.one_line_profile: Design of experiments for model discrimination using GP surrogates
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for optimal experimental design (OED) focused on model discrimination, utilizing Gaussian Process surrogate models to handle expensive experiments.

tools.name: molpal
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning for high-throughput virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: Molecular Pool Active Learning (MolPAL) is a software for accelerated high-throughput virtual screening using active learning to efficiently explore chemical space.

tools.name: super-HTS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for super high-throughput enzyme screening
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework to perform super high-throughput screening of enzyme mutants, enabling rapid analysis of vast search spaces.

tools.name: platereader
tools.one_line_profile: Designs for a miniaturized high-throughput plate reader
tools.detailed_description: Hardware designs and software for a miniaturized plate reader aimed at high-throughput phenotypic screening in biological labs.

tools.name: Siglent_SDS1202X-E_VISA_MATLAB
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB interface for Siglent Oscilloscope Data Acquisition
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB functions for controlling and acquiring data from Siglent SDS1202X-E oscilloscopes via VISA (USB/Ethernet), facilitating lab data collection.

tools.name: Siglent_SDS1202X-E_VISA_Scilab
tools.one_line_profile: Scilab interface for Siglent Oscilloscope Data Acquisition
tools.detailed_description: Scilab functions for controlling and acquiring data from Siglent SDS1202X-E oscilloscopes via VISA, providing an open-source alternative for lab instrumentation control.

tools.name: AIC_Finder
tools.one_line_profile: Detection of Assay Interfering Compounds in HTS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool employing Minimum Variance Sampling Analysis (MVS-A) to identify Assay Interfering Compounds (AIC) in High Throughput Screening (HTS) datasets, improving data quality.

tools.name: HiTSeekR
tools.one_line_profile: R Shiny app for High-Throughput Screening data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R Shiny web application designed for the analysis and visualization of various types of high-throughput screening (HTS) data.

tools.name: MF-PCBA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-fidelity high-throughput screening benchmarks for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A collection of datasets and benchmarks for evaluating multi-fidelity machine learning models in the context of high-throughput screening for drug discovery.

tools.name: surrkick
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate models for predicting black-hole kicks in numerical relativity
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to predict black-hole kicks (recoil velocities) resulting from binary black hole mergers using numerical-relativity surrogate models.

tools.name: CbAS
tools.one_line_profile: Conditioning by Adaptive Sampling for robust design in biological sequences
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Conditioning by Adaptive Sampling (CbAS) algorithm, designed for robust optimization and design of biological sequences (e.g., proteins, DNA) using generative models.

tools.name: RNAFlow
tools.one_line_profile: RNA structure and sequence design via inverse folding-based flow matching
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for RNA design that utilizes inverse folding-based flow matching to generate RNA sequences and structures.

tools.name: axtreme
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions for Ax and BoTorch for experimental design and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A development repository providing extensions and utilities for the Ax and BoTorch libraries, specifically tailored for the RaPiD project in experimental design and Bayesian optimization.

tools.name: Dragonfly
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Bayesian optimization library for high-dimensional problems
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library for scalable Bayesian optimization, designed to handle high-dimensional parameter spaces and expensive objective functions, suitable for scientific experimental planning and hyperparameter tuning.

tools.name: edibble
tools.one_line_profile: R package for planning and managing experimental designs
tools.detailed_description: An R package that encapsulates elements of experimental design to facilitate better planning, management, and workflow of scientific experiments.

tools.name: NIDN
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Inverse Design of Nanostructures
tools.detailed_description: A framework for the neural inverse design of nanostructures, utilizing deep learning to predict geometries from desired optical properties.

tools.name: BoFire
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for experimental design and multi-objective Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: BoFire is a comprehensive framework designed for defining and solving experimental design problems, specifically focusing on multi-objective Bayesian optimization. It supports complex constraints and domain-specific configurations for materials science and chemistry experiments.

tools.name: Ax
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Experimentation Platform for optimizing black-box systems
tools.detailed_description: Ax is a platform for understanding, managing, and automating adaptive experiments. It enables researchers to optimize black-box functions (such as physical experiments or hyperparameter tuning) using Bayesian optimization and bandit algorithms, with a focus on ease of use and modularity.

tools.name: AEPsych
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive experimentation framework for psychophysics and perception research
tools.detailed_description: AEPsych is a framework for adaptive experimentation specifically tailored for psychophysics and perception research. It leverages Gaussian Process regression and Bayesian optimization (via BoTorch) to efficiently estimate psychometric functions and thresholds with fewer trials.

tools.name: Angler
tools.one_line_profile: Frequency-domain photonic simulation and inverse design optimization
tools.detailed_description: Angler is a Python library for frequency-domain photonic simulation and inverse design. It utilizes automatic differentiation to optimize photonic devices (linear and nonlinear) for desired functionalities, serving as a solver for electromagnetic inverse problems.

tools.name: BOSS-RUNS
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic adaptive sampling framework for nanopore sequencing
tools.detailed_description: BOSS-RUNS is a tool for dynamic, adaptive sampling during nanopore sequencing. It uses real-time data analysis and decision-making strategies to optimize the sequencing process, enriching for targets of interest and reducing coverage of off-target regions.

tools.name: fusion_surrogates
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate transport models for tokamak fusion simulation
tools.detailed_description: A library providing surrogate transport models for tokamak fusion research. These models are designed to approximate complex physical simulations, enabling faster experimental planning and optimization for fusion devices.

tools.name: Ceviche Challenges
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for photonic inverse design and topology optimization
tools.detailed_description: Ceviche Challenges is a suite of benchmark problems for photonic inverse design and topology optimization. It provides standard simulation environments and metrics to evaluate and compare different optimization algorithms in the context of electromagnetic device design.

tools.name: ChemHTPS
tools.one_line_profile: Automated high-throughput screening platform for materials and chemicals
tools.detailed_description: ChemHTPS is an automated high-throughput screening (HTS) platform designed to generate and manage materials and chemical data. It facilitates the orchestration of simulation workflows for large-scale materials discovery.

tools.name: MOFreinforce
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning framework for inverse design of Metal-Organic Frameworks
tools.detailed_description: A reinforcement learning framework specifically designed for the inverse design of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs), enabling the automated generation and optimization of material structures.

tools.name: HEBO
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization and reinforcement learning library
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for Bayesian Optimization and Reinforcement Learning, featuring heteroscedastic evolutionary bayesian optimisation, widely used in experiment planning and hyperparameter tuning.

tools.name: pychimera
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for UCSF Chimera molecular visualization system
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a standard Python interface to UCSF Chimera, enabling the automation of molecular visualization and analysis tasks within scientific workflows.

tools.name: invrs-gym
tools.one_line_profile: Gym environments for inverse design challenges
tools.detailed_description: A collection of standard inverse design challenges and benchmarks, providing a gym-like environment for developing and testing optimization algorithms in photonics and materials science.

tools.name: GDM-PCE
tools.one_line_profile: Manifold learning-based polynomial chaos expansions for surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing high-dimensional surrogate models using manifold learning and polynomial chaos expansions (PCE), designed to accelerate simulations and uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: Dragonfly Legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for large-scale climate and urban heat island modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library used for modeling large-scale climate phenomena and urban heat islands, enabling the simulation of environmental factors in urban planning and climate science.

tools.name: ALF
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for machine-learned interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to automate the training of machine-learned interatomic potentials through active learning loops, facilitating efficient exploration of chemical space for materials science.

tools.name: Llamole
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal LLMs for inverse molecular design and retrosynthesis
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging Multimodal Large Language Models to perform inverse molecular design and retrosynthetic planning, integrating chemical reasoning with generative capabilities.

tools.name: torch-molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for molecular discovery and property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library providing an sklearn-style interface for molecular property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning, aimed at accelerating drug discovery and materials design.

tools.name: PyPSeis
tools.one_line_profile: Package for passive seismic forward modelling and event detection
tools.detailed_description: A Python and C++ package designed for passive seismic forward modeling, microseismic event detection, and source location, supporting acquisition design and synthetic seismogram generation.

tools.name: Multifidelity DeepONet
tools.one_line_profile: Multifidelity deep neural operators for PDE solving
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of multifidelity deep neural operators (DeepONet) for efficiently learning partial differential equations (PDEs), specifically applied to fast inverse design problems like nanoscale heat transport.

tools.name: PROFOIL
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse airfoil design tool
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran-based tool for the inverse design of airfoils, allowing for the generation of airfoil geometries based on prescribed aerodynamic properties.

tools.name: BOA
tools.one_line_profile: High-level Bayesian Optimization framework wrapping Ax and BoTorch
tools.detailed_description: Bayesian Optimization for Anything (BOA) is a framework that simplifies the use of advanced Bayesian optimization libraries (Ax, BoTorch) for experimental planning and parameter tuning in scientific workflows.

tools.name: dZiner
tools.one_line_profile: Chemist AI Agent for rational inverse design of materials
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent framework designed for the rational inverse design of materials, capable of planning and executing design strategies to discover new materials with desired properties.

tools.name: BoTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization library in PyTorch for experimental planning and hyperparameter tuning
tools.detailed_description: BoTorch is a library for Bayesian Optimization built on PyTorch. It provides a modular and easily extensible interface for composing Bayesian optimization primitives, including probabilistic models, acquisition functions, and optimizers, widely used in material science experimental planning.

tools.name: NNI
tools.one_line_profile: AutoML toolkit for automating feature engineering, neural architecture search, and hyperparameter tuning
tools.detailed_description: Neural Network Intelligence (NNI) is an open source AutoML toolkit that helps users design and tune machine learning models, neural network architectures, and hyper-parameters. In AI4S, it is frequently used as the optimization engine for experimental planning and model search.

tools.name: AGFusion
tools.one_line_profile: Python package to annotate and visualize gene fusions
tools.detailed_description: AGFusion is a tool for annotating and visualizing gene fusions from DNA or RNA sequencing data. It provides detailed information about the fusion protein structure and domains.

tools.name: UQPCE
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification using Polynomial Chaos Expansion
tools.detailed_description: UQPCE is a NASA-developed python-based research code for uncertainty quantification in parametric, non-deterministic computational studies using polynomial chaos expansion surrogate modeling.

tools.name: yacrd
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control tool for detecting chimeric reads in sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Yet Another Chimeric Read Detector (yacrd) is a tool for quality control of long-read sequencing data, specifically designed to identify and filter chimeric reads.

tools.name: ChiDG
tools.one_line_profile: Chimera-based discontinuous Galerkin solver for CFD
tools.detailed_description: ChiDG is a discontinuous Galerkin solver designed for Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) that utilizes Chimera (overset) grids to handle complex geometries.

tools.name: Cassiopee
tools.one_line_profile: CFD pre- and post-processing python modules
tools.detailed_description: Cassiopee is a set of Python modules for pre- and post-processing in Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), developed by ONERA. It handles mesh manipulation, solution extraction, and other CFD workflow tasks.

tools.name: AntiFold
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse folding tool for antibody structure-based design
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improved antibody structure-based design using inverse folding techniques, enabling the generation of antibody sequences that fold into specific structures.

tools.name: DeepCE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for phenotype screening
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed for high-throughput mechanism-driven phenotype screening, facilitating drug response prediction and discovery.

tools.name: BayesOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Bayesian optimization and experimental design
tools.detailed_description: A C++ toolbox for Bayesian optimization, experimental design, and stochastic bandits, widely used for optimizing black-box functions in scientific experiments.

tools.name: Dragonflye
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial isolate genome assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Nanopore reads, integrating multiple tools for long-read assembly.

tools.name: MatInvent
tools.one_line_profile: Generative diffusion models for inverse materials design
tools.detailed_description: A platform for accelerating inverse materials design using generative diffusion models combined with reinforcement learning.

tools.name: DoEgen
tools.one_line_profile: Library for optimised Design of Experiment (DoE) generation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the generation and evaluation of optimised Designs of Experiments (DoE), facilitating efficient experimental planning.

tools.name: MPOPIS
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive importance sampling modification to Model Predictive Path Integral (MPPI) control
tools.detailed_description: A Julia implementation of MPOPIS, an adaptive importance sampling method for Model Predictive Path Integral control, useful for optimization and sampling tasks in control systems.

tools.name: ADASYN
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Adaptive Synthetic Sampling Approach for imbalanced learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ADASYN algorithm for generating synthetic data samples to address class imbalance problems in machine learning datasets.

tools.name: chimeraviz
tools.one_line_profile: R package for automating the creation of chimeric RNA visualizations
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to automate the visualization of chimeric RNA, supporting the analysis of fusion events in transcriptomics data.

tools.name: Summit
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based optimization toolkit for chemical reactions and process engineering
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for optimizing chemical reactions using machine learning, providing tools for experimental design, Bayesian optimization, and reaction management.

tools.name: gwsurrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for evaluating gravitational wave surrogate models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides an easy-to-use interface to gravitational wave surrogate models, enabling efficient evaluation of waveforms for astrophysics research.

tools.name: Tea-lang
tools.one_line_profile: Domain-specific language for experimental design and statistical analysis
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific language (DSL) designed to simplify experimental design and statistical analysis, automating the selection of appropriate statistical tests.

tools.name: dials
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for managing and creating tuning parameter values in the tidymodels ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: Part of the tidymodels ecosystem, dials provides infrastructure to create and manage tuning parameters for statistical modeling and machine learning.

tools.name: tune
tools.one_line_profile: Infrastructure for hyperparameter tuning in the tidymodels ecosystem
tools.detailed_description: Part of the tidymodels ecosystem, tune provides functions and classes for hyperparameter tuning of statistical models.

tools.name: Advisor
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source implementation of Google Vizier for black-box hyperparameter tuning and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A hyperparameter tuning system that implements the Google Vizier interface, supporting black-box optimization for machine learning and scientific experiments.

tools.name: GaUDI
tools.one_line_profile: Guided Diffusion Model for Molecular Inverse Design
tools.detailed_description: GaUDI is a guided diffusion model designed for the inverse design of molecules. It allows for the generation of molecular structures with targeted properties, serving as a generative tool in materials science and chemistry discovery pipelines.

tools.name: vsearch
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile open-source tool for microbiome analysis
tools.detailed_description: VSEARCH is an open-source tool for processing metagenomic sequences, offering functionalities for searching, clustering, chimera detection, and dereplication. It is designed as a free alternative to USEARCH for microbiome data analysis.

tools.name: H_Kriging
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Kriging model implementation for surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: H_Kriging is a MATLAB implementation of the Hierarchical Kriging model, a variable fidelity surrogate modeling technique. It is designed to improve upon co-Kriging for experimental planning and simulation in engineering and materials science.

tools.name: EasySurrogate
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for creating surrogate models of multiscale systems
tools.detailed_description: EasySurrogate is part of the VECMA toolkit, designed to facilitate the creation of surrogate models for multiscale simulations. It provides workflows and tools to replace expensive computational models with efficient surrogates.

tools.name: InvDesFlow-AL
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning-based generative framework for inverse materials design
tools.detailed_description: InvDesFlow-AL is a framework that combines active learning with generative models to optimize the inverse design of materials. It iteratively generates and screens material candidates to target specific properties.

tools.name: AutoOED
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Optimal Experimental Design Platform for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive platform for automated optimal experimental design (OED) aimed at accelerating material discovery. It integrates Bayesian optimization and various acquisition functions to guide experimental planning and parameter optimization.
